content: red poppy pillow designed by stephanie martin http //www spritelygoods com my throw pillows at home have mostly been of the plain square variety since i ve never been terribly good friends with my sewing machine i had to come up with something different and fun to add a bright splash of color and uniqueness to my home thus the red poppy pillow was born this pillow comes together quickly and in a pinch you can even remodel your existing square pillows if you are of a mind to do so do up a bunch in a variety of colors and have a whole bouquet for your home skill level easy 1 copyright 2006 stephanie martin this pattern is for personal use only reproduction of this pattern or products from it for sale are prohibited materials yarn -
